name: Frog Flip
description:
You’re a frog trying to defend the flower at the center of your pond from the encroaching flies. That’s just your luck, because of course frogs love to eat flies. You can move around by extending your freakishly long frog-tongue to another lilypad, then using it to pull yourself forwards. And any flies that run into you or your tongue will be consumed!

Each run of the game generates a new lilypad layout, so don’t get too discouraged if you get a bad score.

This one also works pretty well on phones — you can swipe in a direction to move that way.

More where this came from at http://cassowary.me/
